data.text: Yesu nkeerelha tho “Kihouhimeriani yayo wiira nhihiye nrima nrina inyu.
Attu anowoomolhani mwaattiva mmanupani mwaya mwo unlhapelha Nlhuku. Eiyo tho, mahuku anoowa, kila ntu nothanana uwiivani mwaattiva naanyihereke wiira nonkaviha Nlhuku.
Attu anowa uupangelhani yoyo mwaha uyo ukhalhawaya khaachuwenlhe Athithi, mena khakichuwenlhe mii.
Paahi etu, kihoohimeriani yayo ikatema yo upangia waya yaphiyaka, mmwe mwoopuwelha wiira kahowaamukani.
Nansho vano kinokelha wa ayo akirumme ayo, nansho khaawo inakhalhaka mmoka inyu nokikoha wiira nnokelha vayi.
Ukhalhawaya vano kihouhimeriani yoyo mwaha uyo, ihuzuni ihoucharani mu nrimani mwinyu.
Kinouhimeriani ikeekhene wiira, ihorera nambaya miyaano kirwee, ukhalhawaya kaahirweeke, Okaviha uyo khanowa uwaninyu. Paahi etu, karwaakaru, kinonruma uwaninyu.
Ni uyo vanottuna awe uwa, nowoopusha attu o velhaponi wiira irusho chaya chihowonya, ahottekelha ikekhia ni ihukumu ya Nlhuku.
Ahowonya wo nlhatu wo hikirumelhelha.
Ahohiya mwaha wo uvara ikekhia, ni ukhalhawaya vano kinokelha wa Athithi, khannokoona tho.
Ahotteka mwaha wo ihukumu ya Nlhuku, ukhalhawaya nholhelhi o velhaponi va, Nakare homalha uhukumulhiya.
“Kihanaa malhove menchi o uhimeriani, nansho vano, khannooria uvilhelha.

Vanohalha aya uwa Iphumu ya upatakulha ikeekhene ya Nlhuku, nouchuwelhihani ikeekhene yonkhaye. Khanowa ahimiachaka wo ikuru awe mwanene, nansho noolhumacheke inohalha awe wiiwa ni uchuwelhihani chittu chinowa.
Yoyo naakithimicheke mii, ukhalhawaya nowa uuchuwelhihani chinohalha awe wiiwa uwannyaka.
Chittu chonkhaye chirina aya Athithi phi chawaka, phi nlhatu no uhimia wiira Iphumu ya Nlhuku nouchuwelhihani chinohalha aka ummaha ovaheni.
“Ihohalha ikatema vakani mwaatti khannokona, ni ikatema vakani inowa nnookona.”
Owiittucha awe akina nkayakohana ashineneru, “Ana nohimiani vanoniirelha awe, ‘Wo ikatema vakani khannokoona, ni ikatema vakani inowa nnookona?’ Tho neera, ‘Ukhalhawaya kinokelha wa Athithi!’
Rina maana ani vaneera awe, ‘Wo ikatema vakani?’ Khanichuwenlhe inoolhumacha awe.”

Yesu ahochuwelha wiira yaathanana unkoha, paahi etu nkeerelha, “Chani, woonaka nnookohana mwaashineneru mwaha kuulhumanche aka wiira, ‘Wo ikatema vakani khannokoona, ni ikatema vakani inowa nnookona tho?’
Kinouhimeriani ikekhiaye, mwaattiva nnowunlha ni uwereiya munrimani, nansho ilhapo inootelhiya, nnookhalha ni ihuzuni nansho ihuzuni inyu inoorukunuwa ukhalha uteelhiya nrima.

Ikatema opani ari munkurini vaneethaphulha aya anowoona uweria aya ukhalhawaya ikatema yo uweria ihophiya, nansho amalhaka wiithaphulha khaanoopuwelha tho uweria uwo nlhatu no uteelhiya wiira mwaana mwankani hoyaria velhaponi.
Chiichammo phi ri aya uwaninyu mwaatti, vano nri mu wuunlhani, nansho kinowa koowoonani tho, ni mirima chinyu chinowa uteelhiya, uteelhiya uhinooria uthamihiya ni ntu.
“Nenno nihuku nno nawaaka, khannowa mwaakilhepelha ittu iriyoothe. Ikekheene kinouhimeriani, iriyoothe inottuna inyu waalhepelha Athithi wo nchina naka, anouvahani.
Mpaka nna khannavekelha ittu iriyoothe wo nchina naka. Nvekelheke nnoovahiya, ikhalhe wiira uteelhiya winyu utimire.
“Kihoohimeriani yayo wo malhikaaniho. Nansho ikatema inoowa vahinowa aka wulhumacha wo malhikaaniho, nansho kinowa wulhumacha mwaari wo uhivitha mwaha unaacha Athithi.
Nenno nihuku nno nawaaka, nnowa mwaalhapelha Athithi wo nchina naka, kuuhimeriakani wiira akinowa kaalhepelha wo ulhepelhelhani mwaattiva,
ukhalhawaya Athithi anene anouttunani mwaattiva. Anouttunani ukhalhawaya mwaattiva nhokittuna mii ni urumelhelha wiira kikhumme wa Nlhuku.
Miyaano kaakhumme wa Athithi, nkakaawa velhaponi, uno vano kinoohiya ilhapo ni uhokolhia wa Athithi.”
Paahi owiittucha awe nkayaamwiirelha, “Eiyo, vano nnoolhumacha wo uhivitha, nhuulhumachaka wo malhikaaniho.
Vano nihochuwelha wiira inyuva nnoochuwelha kila ittu, ihooriaka uukohani tho ittu iriyoothe. Yeyo phi nonirumelhelhilha wiira nkhumme wa Nlhuku.”
Yesu nkaakhulhacha, “Chani, nnoorumelhelha vano?

Ikatema inoowa, ni iyo ihomalha uphiya, mwaattiva onkhaye vanottuna inyu umwariaa kila ntu uwannyawe, ni mii kinoohiiya yeekha aka. Nansho miyaano khakirii yekhaaka, ukhalhawaya Athithi arii vamoka ni mii.
Kihoohimeriani ulha mwaha ulha wiira nkhalheke ni mpuha wo ulhutaana ni mii. Nnoowa mwaahuvihiya velhaponi, nansho mpisheke nrima! Miyaano kihokottolha ilhapo!”
